text: Aigondigné is a commune in the department of Deux-Sèvres, western France. The municipality was established on 1 January 2019 by merger of the former communes of Aigonnay, Mougon-Thorigné and Sainte-Blandine.Arrêté préfectoral 13 November 2018 Mougon-Thorigné was the result of the merger, on 1 January 2017, of the former communes of Mougon and Thorigné.Arrêté préfectoral 29 November 2016 == See also == *Communes of the Deux-Sèvres department == References == Category:Communes of Deux-Sèvres Category:Populated places established in 2019
title: Aigondigné
